price: Аврам рече: "Заиста сте ви, а и преци ваши, у очигледној заблуди.“
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
